title: Font used for Unkown Pleasures
content:
I'm guessing this is a pretty easy one. I need to know wich type was used for the Unknown Pleasures lp by Joy Division. I'm not that good of a type identifier, so any help is welcome.

[http://www.cerysmaticfactory.info/images/fact10credits.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019161552/http:/www.cerysmaticfactory.info/images/fact10credits.jpg)
author: NapoleJon

comments.content: Thanks Stephen. Weird that the link is already down, but i've got my answer so doesn't really matter.
